output_list.criticism: Integer overflow in mintToken function allows the owner to set the balance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can mint arbitrary amounts of tokens.
Integer overflow in transferFrom function allows a user to set the allowance of an arbitrary user to any value, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can increase a user's allowance.
Predictable random value in buy function allows attackers to always win the game, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can control the game's random buy price.
Access control vulnerability in sell function allows attackers to arbitrarily increase the sell price, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can control the game's sell price.
Access control vulnerability in transfer function allows attackers to arbitrarily increase a user's balance, causing a potential exploitation where attackers can control a user's balance.
